resources.string: Webkisosk app provides easy access of timetable and attendance in a safe and secure manner.All user data is locally stored in the phone providing no room for leaking of your vital information(even to the developers).
Specified time slot is not free.
Unable to update attendance, try again later.
Oops! Couldn\'t login your webkiosk account.\n\nYour account seems to be blocked or password is been changed recently.
Unable to create database, try again.
Are you sure you want to delete this class?
Unable to connect to timetable server, try again later.
Invalid Enrollment number or wrong college selected.
Enroll or Password cannot be blank.
To reduce carrier data charges, don\'t auto-update over mobile networks
Are you sure you want to logout?
Restores default timetable.\nAll modifications made by you will be lost!
If you enjoy using webkiosk, please take a moment to rate it.Thanks a lot for your support!
Updating attendance, could take up to 5 minutes.
Updating detailed attendance, could take up to 5 minutes.
Oops! Your Webkiosk account is locked.\nContact webkiosk administrator to get new password.
